dcterms:creator: A. Reiss
D. Stricker
dcterms:description: A mobile dataset containing data of 18 different physical activities performed by 9 subjects wearing 3 inertial measurement units, including accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer.
dcterms:title: PAMAP2

dcterms:creator: M. G. Terzano
L. Parrino
A. Smerieri
R. Chervin
S. Chokroverty
C. Guilleminault
M. Hirshkowitz
M. Mahowald
H. Moldofsky
A. Rosa
dcterms:description: A clinical dataset characterized by periodic physiological signals occurring during wake, S1-S4 sleep stages, and REM sleep, including EEG, EOG, EMG, respiration, and EKG signals.
dcterms:title: CAP Sleep Database

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
Y. Chen
Z. Pan
dcterms:description: A dataset collected to detect mental fatigue in healthy individuals using physiological signals from wearable devices.
dcterms:title: Mental Fatigue Dataset
